R.J.Sewell

Postdoc at ICFO - the institute of Photonic Sciences, Barcelona.

  • Presentations

This is a full list of conference presentations (talks & posters), lectures & seminars that I have given. In the conference presentations I also include presentations that my colleagues have given about our work. The presenting author is highlighted in bold.

Invited Talks

  1. R.J. Sewell, M. Napolitano, N. Behbood, G. Colangelo, F. Martin Ciurana & M.W.Mitchell. Certified quantum non-demolition measurement of atomic spins. ICO23 (Santiago de Compostella, Spain, 2014).

  2. R.J. Sewell, M. Napolitano, N. Behbood, G. Colangelo, F. Martin Ciurana & M.W.Mitchell. Quantum–enhanced atomic magnetometry. Información cuántica en España (Zaragoza, Spain, 2014).

Invited Lectures

  1. R.J. Sewell. Atomic Physics. Winter School on Quantum Physics & Quantum Information (Olomouz University, Czech Republic, 2014).
